package stream.start;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.stream.Stream;

public class StreamStartMain {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<String> names = List.of("Apple", "Banana", "Berry", "Tomato");
        Stream<String> stream = names.stream();
        List<String> result = stream
                .filter(name -> name.startsWith("B"))
                .map(s -> s.toUpperCase())
                .toList();

        System.out.println("=== ì™¸ë¶€ ë°˜ë³µ ===");
        for (String s : result) {

        System.out.println("=== ë©”ì„œë“œ ì°¸ì¡° ===");
        names.stream()
                .filter(name -> name.startsWith("B"))
                .map(String::toUpperCase)
                .forEach(System.out::println);
    }
}

package stream.basic;

import java.util.List;

public class ImmutableMain {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<Integer> originList = List.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
        System.out.println("originList = " + originList);

        List<Integer> filteredList = originList.stream()
                .filter(n -> n % 2 == 0)
                .toList();
        System.out.println("filteredList = " + filteredList);
        System.out.println("originList = " + originList);
    }
}

package stream.basic;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.stream.Stream;

public class DuplicateExecutionMain {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Stream<Integer> stream = Stream.of(1, 2, 3);
        stream.forEach(System.out::println);

        stream.forEach(System.out::println);

        List<Integer> list = List.of(1, 2, 3);
        Stream.of(list).forEach(System.out::println);
        Stream.of(list).forEach(System.out::println);
    }
}

package stream.basic;

import lambda.lambda5.mystream.MyStreamV3;

import java.util.List;

public class LazyEvalMain1 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<Integer> data = List.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6);
        ex1(data);
        ex2(data);
    }

    private static void ex1(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì‹œì‘ ==");

        List<Integer> result = MyStreamV3.of(data)
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                })
                .toList();

        System.out.println("result = " + result);
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }

    private static void ex2(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== Stream API ì‹œì‘ ==");

        List<Integer> result = data.stream()
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                })
                .toList();

        System.out.println("result = " + result);
        System.out.println("== Stream API ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }
}

package stream.basic;

import lambda.lambda5.mystream.MyStreamV3;

import java.util.List;

public class LazyEvalMain2 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<Integer> data = List.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6);
        ex1(data);
        ex2(data);
    }

    private static void ex1(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì‹œì‘ ==");

        MyStreamV3.of(data)
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                });
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }

    private static void ex2(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== Stream API ì‹œì‘ ==");

        data.stream()
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                });

        System.out.println("== Stream API ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }
}

ì´ì œ ë³¸ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì‚´í´ë³´ì.

package stream.basic;

import lambda.lambda5.mystream.MyStreamV3;

import java.util.List;

public class LazyEvalMain3 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        List<Integer> data = List.of(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6);
        ex1(data);
        ex2(data);
    }

    private static void ex1(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì‹œì‘ ==");

        Integer result = MyStreamV3.of(data)
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                })
                .getFirst();

        System.out.println("result = " + result);
        System.out.println("== MyStreamV3 ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }

    private static void ex2(List<Integer> data) {
        System.out.println("== Stream API ì‹œì‘ ==");

        Integer result = data.stream()
                .filter(i -> {
                    boolean isEven = i % 2 == 0;
                    System.out.println("filter() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + "(" + isEven + ")");
                    return isEven;
                })
                .map(i -> {
                    int mapped = i * 10;
                    System.out.println("map() ì‹¤í–‰: " + i + " -> " + mapped);
                    return mapped;
                })
                .findFirst().get();

        System.out.println("result = " + result);
        System.out.println("== Stream API ì¢…ë£Œ ==");
    }
}
